product_name: Life is good Adventure Cargo Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Life is good(R) Journey Cargo Shorts offer a casual, comfortable feel with a 10 in. inseam for plenty of coverage. Life is good(R) Journey Cargo Shorts features garment-washed cotton for softness and breathability. Mid-rise waist features fixed waistband, zip fly and button closure. Hand pockets, cargo pockets and back flap pockets. Closeout.
